verses.verse: (Assurance of God’s Protection) A Song of Ascents. I lift up my eyes to the hills— from where will my help come?
(Ps 115.15; 124.8) My help comes from the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
(Ps 66.9; 127.1) He will not let your foot be moved; he who keeps you will not slumber.
He who keeps Israel will neither slumber nor sleep.
(Ps 16.8; Isa 25.4) The LORD is your keeper; the LORD is your shade at your right hand.
(Ps 91.5; Isa 49.10; Rev 7.16) The sun shall not strike you by day nor the moon by night.
(Ps 91.10-12) The LORD will keep you from all evil; he will keep your life.
(Deut 28.6) The LORD will keep your going out and your coming in from this time on and forevermore.
